name: Clyde The Sheriff
description:
Go check the Options first, make sure to look at the controls.

All the cowboys from El Paso know how to "moonwalk" okay?

Tips:

-To skip the 2 minute clock, talk to the npc close to the store.

-Mobs respawn after you change location, especially at the deserts soo, be  careful. Same happen when you go to the saloon after the meteor.

- We strongly recommend that you restart the page if you want to play again after one trial.
